sayings: I'm sure I don't need any beauty sleep. 😴
Nap time is my happy hour.
I'm not lazy, I'm just conserving energy.
Take my paw, we're off to never-never land.
No day is so bad it can‚Äôt be fixed with a nap.
I planned to take over the world but I'm tired.
There is a time for eating, and there is also a time for sleep.
I'm like a caterpillar: I eat a lot, sleep for a while and wake up beautiful.
I'm so good at sleeping I can do it with my eyes open.
I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.
I'm furious, someone else is in the best bed. 😠
Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn.
By the pricking of my paws, something hairy this way comes.
Time to check which bed is free. 🛏Ô∏è
I'll chew this piece of furniture until I get what I want.
I would like, if I may, to take you on a strange journey.
Listen to them ‚Äî the guinea pigs in the night. What music they make!
It's a long way to the top.
I have a bad feeling about this.
I have a constant fear that something's always near.
Being a guinea pig is hard work.
I am not a furry potato.
I'm not from Guinea and I'm not a pig.
I am not a stinky pig!
Let me sing you the song of my people.
I used to be an adventurer like you, until I took a cucumber to the knee.
I think therefore I am a Guinea Pig.
I just got lost in thought.
Where's room service? This cage needs a clean. 🧹
It's been a funny sort of day, hasn't it?
Did you ever stop to think, and forget to start again?
If I look confused it is because I am thinking.
Are you suggesting that coconuts migrate?
Take me down to Piggy city, where the grass is green.
Did I just hear the back door open?
Did I just hear the clatter of cutlery? 🍴
Do guinea pigs dream of hay?
I'm either eating, about to eat or thinking about eating.
First we eat, then we do everything else.
I eat when I'm upset, okay?
Did I just hear the fridge open?
I'm on a seafood diet, I see food and I eat it.
Never eat more than you can lift.
Just one more wafer-thin piece of cucumber.
Time is an illusion. Lunchtime doubly so.
I'm having cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, nuggets and cucumber.
Under this sofa is very interesting. 🛋Ô∏è
This floor goes on for miles.
I'm just going to march off over here.
Quick, back to the piggy bunker!
Is that the ceiling or am I under a table?
Oh, show me a home where the guinea pigs roam and the floor will need a good sweep.
Hmmm, yes the floor here is made out of floor.
I told you I was ill.
A random photo from the archives.
It was the best of times.
